news.title: Facebook Announces #BuyBlack Friday Campaign In Support of Black Owned Businesses
news.description: Between October 30 and November 27, a campaign will urge users to buy Black-owned brands during the Black Friday retail event as part of the Holiday Hub “Season of Support.”

news.title: Facebook Bans Holocaust Denial Amid Rapid Rise in “Deceptive” Content
news.description: In a reversal of controversial policies, Facebook is strengthening its enforcement against hate speech and misinformation in response to a perceived rise in anti-Semitism worldwide.

news.title: Guide to Navigating Social Media During the Election
news.description: Explore these tips for reducing the risk of misinformation on social media regarding the November election and learn about what major outlets are doing to address this issue.

news.title: How to Improve Your Branding on Instagram
news.description: Designer Kat Coroy explains how to find your unique brand style and translate it to an Instagram profile, while improving your Instagram images and taking more effective selfies.
